title: Trump's second budget plan unveiled
text:
Trump's second budget plan unveiled 1:42pm GMT - 00:37 
President Donald Trump's second budget was unveiled on Monday - with his plan seeking to make good on his promise to bolster military spending and requesting funds for infrastructure, construction of a wall along the border with Mexico and opioid treatment programs. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
